import React ,{useState} from 'react' import './css/MessagePannel.css' import MessageSenderLayout from './MessageSenderLayout' import {Row ,Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import MessageReceiveLayout from './MessageReceiveLayout' const MessagePannel = ({socket}) => { const [newMessage ,add_New_Message] = useState([]) socket.on("message", (msg)=>{ console.log("I got the message s") alert(msg) add_New_Message( [...newMessage ,msg]) }) return (
) } export default MessagePannel
